gen:link.msg:message: `InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests` BEHOORT gelijk te zijn aan de sommatie van de onderliggende waarden. | {if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_InvestmentsInParticipatingInterests return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsDebit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsDebit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}{if (not(xff:has-fallback-value(xs:QName('varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsCredit')))) then ((for $v in $varArc_NotesParticipatingInterestsBreakdownPensionFunds_PrtFST1SumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfInvestmentsInParticipatingInterestsCredit return concat("name:'",$v/name(),"', value:'",$v,"', @contextRef:'",$v/@contextRef,"', @unitRef:'",$v/@unitRef,"' | "))) else ''}
